body_html:
We're just about wrapping up a major refactoring of HMC (and MCMC) code. The new version will have an UncalibratedHMC (which has no MetropolisHastings adjustment) as well as what is currently HMC.

Also, we're moving MCMC code to: github.com/tensorflow/probability
body_text:
We're just about wrapping up a major refactoring of HMC (and MCMC) code.  The new version will have an UncalibratedHMC (which has no MetropolisHastings adjustment) as well as what is currently HMC.
Also, we're moving MCMC code to: github.com/tensorflow/probability
body:
We're just about wrapping up a major refactoring of HMC (and MCMC) code.  The new version will have an UncalibratedHMC (which has no MetropolisHastings adjustment) as well as what is currently HMC.

Also, we're moving MCMC code to: github.com/tensorflow/probability
